data.name: Retro Invasion
data.detailed_description:
Retro Invasion is an Beta Version



Game Information:

In Retro Invasion you can choose which game mode you want to play, in Campaign
mode you have to kill and stop the monsters, the monsters are not allowed to conquer
the world. In Invasion Mode you have to kill all monsters and finish each level without
dying, if you don’t make it it starts again. But if they succeed then the monsters
have no changes to conquer the world.


Key cards information:

The key cards are important because you cannot enter any
other room without a key card, of course there are also rooms
where you do not need a card. You will find the key cards in each
level. Choose carefully which room to open first, if you open a
room it may happen that you are in a other room can no longer
enter, this is of course not old so bad but optionally it should not
happen. The key cards have different colors (Red/Yellow/Blue)


Weapon information:

In Retro Invasion, they have different weapons to fight the monsters.
Weapons available (pistol/minigun/shotgun/rocket launcher/Uzi)
the weapons don’t have to be found or collected. All described
weapons can be used directly.



Game Modes:
  • Campaign
  • Invasion


Content that is yet to come:

  • Campaign coming soon

data.short_description: If you like retro games, then Retro Invasion is the right place for you. The game mechanics are simple and quick for everyone to understand. It is a retro designed shooter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Only Windows supported | 64 Bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Only Windows supported | 64 Bit

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
